query:
ALTER TABLE `users` ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `avatarUrl` TEXT;
ALTER TABLE `users` ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `avatarType` ENUM('initials', 'boring', 'upload') DEFAULT 'initials';
